titles.title: A resolution calling for the release of Ukrainian fighter pilot Nadiya Savchenko, who was captured by Russian forces in Eastern Ukraine and has been held illegally in a Russian prison since July 2014.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Senate Committee on Foreign Relations discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
2/12/2015--Passed Senate amended. Condemns the government of the Russian Federation for its illegal imprisonment of Nadiya Savchenko, and calls on the government of the Russian Federation to release her immediately.
Calls on the United States, its European allies, and the international community to support efforts to release Nadiya Savchenko.
Expresses solidarity with the Ukrainian people.
